metrics:
Duration spent in service
Duration spent processing packets
Duration spent in service
Duration spent processing packets
Duration spent waiting for tls_cv signatures
Duration of scheduling one microblock
Duration of discovering that there are no schedulable transactions
Duration of inserting one transaction into the pool of available transactions
Duration of the computation associated with marking one microblock as complete
Count of transactions in a scheduled microblock, including both votes and non-votes
Count of simple vote transactions in a scheduled microblock
The number of cost units scheduled for each block pack produced. This can be higher than the block limit because of returned CUs.
The number of compute units rebated for each block pack produced. Compute units are rebated when a transaction fails prior to execution or requests more compute units than it uses.
The net number of cost units (scheduled - rebated) in each block pack produced.
The percent of the total block cost limit used for each block pack produced.
"
Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we receive the bank.
Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we receive the first microblock.
Delay between when we become leader in a slot and when we finish the slot.
Delay in starting the slot caused by loading the information needed to generate the bundle crank transactions
Number of contact infos in the cluster contact info message
The size (in bytes) of each microblock batch that is shredded
The number of microblocks in each microblock batch that is shredded
Duration of producing one FEC set from the shredder
Duration of verifying and processing one shred received from the network
